snippet: The slowdown added to worries about the ability of the world’s second-largest economy to offset low growth elsewhere.
abstract: China reports its gross domestic product grew at an annual rate of 7.6 percent in the second quarter, down from 9.5 percent in year-ago quarter; slowdown adds to worries about its ability to offset low growth elsewhere.
lead_paragraph: The slowdown added to worries about the ability of the world’s second-largest economy to offset low growth elsewhere.

headline.main: China’s Growth Rate Slowed in the 2nd Quarter
headline.print_headline: China’s Growth Rate Slowed in the 2nd Quarter, Down Sharply From a Year Ago
